arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC connection.

authentication.description: The authentication type for the client VPC connection. Specify one of these auth type strings: SASL_IAM, SASL_SCRAM, or TLS.

clientSubnets.description: The list of subnets in the client VPC to connect to.

securityGroups.description: The security groups to attach to the ENIs for the broker nodes.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

targetClusterArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

vpcId.description: The VPC ID of the remote client.

vpcId.description: The VPC ID of the remote client.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering VpcConnection resources.
